activities: VCE has subsidiaries located in the EU and will therefore receive employee information from such subsidiaries.  VCE and its foreign subsidiaries will also sell products and services in the EU and may receive customer information in connection with such sales.
eucountries: Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization data, some of which is manually processed.  In the future, we may also process customer data.
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); For all other types of data: TRUSTe
